Bill Smith, Shippensburg University

4 Mike Brewer

Position Defensive Back

Ht./Wt. 5-11 / 200

Class Graduate Student

Hometown Bridgeville, Del.

Major Communication, Journalism & Media (Visual Media)

Highschool Woodbridge (Wesley)

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2022 (Senior): Played in four games before missing the final seven games due to injury…contributed 13 tackles, including 12 solo while healthy…registered six tackles and a forced fumble Week 3 against Indiana (Pa.).

2021 (Junior): Started in all 11 games as the strong safety for the Raiders in his debut season with the team…finished the season ranked third on the team with 49 tackles, including 32 solo tackles…recorded multiple tackles in all but one game, including a season-high eight tackles in the season opener against West Virginia State…totaled five or more tackles in five games, including seven tackles at Kutztown…intercepted three passes for a total of 93 yards, including a 50-yard return at East Stroudsburg and a 43-yard return against Lock Haven…registered five pass breakups…recorded two TFLs for three yards.

2020 (Junior): Played in all three of Wesley’s games during a shortened season because of the COVID-19 pandemic…intercepted a pass and returned it 76 yards for a touchdown against Montclair State…led the team with 15 solo tackles…finished with 17 tackles, including a season-high nine tackles at Salisbury and eight tackles against Montclair State…recorded one TFL…credited with multiple pass breakups.

2019 (Sophomore): Played in 11 games at linebacker in his second season at Wesley College…finished second on the team with three interceptions, including a 91-yard interception return for a touchdown in the NCAA playoffs against Framingham State…also intercepted passes in close wins over Rowan and Delaware Valley…recovered a fumble and returned it 23 yards for a touchdown against TCNJ…ranked sixth on the team in tackles…amassed 54 total tackles, including 26 solo tackles…recorded at least three tackles in each of his appearances, including a career-high 10 tackles at Delaware Valley and eight tackles against Christopher Newport…finished with two forced fumbles…registered 7.0 TFLs for a total of 36 yards lost…achieved 3.5 sacks, including solo sacks in three different games…credited with multiple pass breakups…contributed to a team that reached the second round of the NCAA Division III Football Championships.

2018 (Freshman): Played in nine games as a reserve in his first season at Wesley College…returned an interception 69 yards for a touchdown against William Paterson in his first collegiate game…finished the season with seven solo tackles, including multiple solo tackles in three games…contributed to special teams.

Woodbridge High School: Totaled multiple varsity letters for the Raiders under head coach Ed Manlove…named to the All-State Third Team in Delaware as a wide receiver…selected to the All-Henlopen Conference First Team as a wide receiver and as a defensive end…recorded more than 20 TFLs, including six sacks and five forced fumbles…scored two defensive touchdowns…achieved varsity letters in five sports, including basketball, baseball, lacrosse and track & field.

About Brewer: Full name is Michael Brewer…is the son of Michael Brewer and Mary McNeill…majoring in communication, journalism and media with a concentration in visual media while seeking a minor in sociology...has five siblings: Spencer Wright, Dazaray Wright, Janqwon Wright, Mikeya Brewer and Jazzy Coats.
